item.title: My First Post
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to my blog!

This is my first post using the PaperMod theme for Hugo.

Features

PaperMod includes many great features:

  • 🌙 Dark/Light mode toggle
  • 📱 Mobile responsive design
  • 🔍 Search functionality
  • 📖 Archive page
  • 🏷️ Tags and categories
  • 💬 Comment system support
  • 📊 Reading time and word count
  • 🧭 Breadcrumbs navigation

Code Example

Here’s a simple code example:

def hello_world():
    print("Hello, PaperMod!")

hello_world()

What’s Next?

Start writing your amazing content! You can:

  1. Customize the theme settings in hugo.toml
  2. Add your social media links
  3. Create more posts in the content/posts/ directory
  4. Deploy your site to GitHub Pages or any hosting platform

Happy blogging! 🎉
